text:
After view test results in "View Results Tree" Listener, selecting run on the 
menubar and clicking clear or clear all resets all fields except the Request 
Data field.

To recreate:  view results in View Results Tree.  I did it via

Test Plan
..|-- Thread Group
........|-- View Results Tree
........|-- HTTP Request

Run the test and view some results in "View Results Tree".  After data is 
displayed in the Results Data JTextArea, click on either Run>Clear or Run>Clear 
All.

Actual output:  the Results Data field is not affected.

Expected output:  The Results Data field should become blank.
